title: Artful Play: Making Faces
description:
Ever wonder about the personalities and feelings of the portraits you see at the Art Institute? Go on a hunt to find the happiest, saddest, and silliest faces in the galleries. Then collage your own expressive portrait using mixed media materials.

This workshop is designed for children ages 3–5 with one or more accompanying adults. Price for the workshop is per person; museum admission or Art Institute membership is also required for participating adults.

A registration form will be sent upon ticket purchase and must be returned to familyprograms@artic.edu prior to the program.

>Registration opens in May. For more information about family programs, please call (312) 857-7161 or e-mail familyprograms@artic.edu. For upcoming family programs, please visit the family programs calendar.
